Sasuke headbutts his opponent, and jumps over them, kicking them in the head. He then kicks them up in the air, punches them back on the ground, and finishes with a Fire Release technique.

[[pl:Musō Gōendan]]
[[pt-br:Grande Bomba de Chamas Inigualável]]
